CoPilot¶

Note

This page Contains Python Library Definitions For XIQ CoPilot Menu

CoPilot¶

class xiq.flows.copilot.Copilot.Copilot¶

Bases: xiq.elements.CopilotWebElements.CopilotWebElements

dismiss_anomaly_for_location_in_dfs_recurrence_widget(location_name, option='yes')¶
  • This Keyword dismiss an anomaly for location based on provided option in DFS Recurrence Widget
  • If option provided is ‘yes’ it will dismiss anomaly else it won’t dismiss
  • Default Option(yes) is to dismiss the Anomaly for Location in DFS Recurrence Widget
  • Flow: CoPilot–> on DFS Recurrence —> Get Location Name and dismiss anomaly
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Dismiss Anomaly For Location In DFS Recurrence Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}
  • Dismiss Anomaly For Location In DFS Recurrence Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}    option=${OPTION}
Parameters:
  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in DFS Recurrence Widget
  • option – confirmation option to delete anomaly(options: yes, no)
Returns:

1 if able to perform dismiss operation with provided option, -1 if anomaly not found
dismiss_anomaly_in_wifi_capacity(location_name, option)¶
  • This Keyword dismiss an anomaly for location based on provided option
  • If option provided is ‘yes’ it will dismiss anomaly else it won’t dismiss
  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name and dismiss anomaly
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Dismiss Anomaly In WiFi Capacity   ${LOCATION_NAME}    ${OPTION}
Parameters:
  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in wifi capacity widget
  • option – confirmation option to delete anomaly(options: yes, no)
Returns:

1 if able to perform dismiss operation with provided option, -1 if anomaly not found
get_anomaly_details_for_location_in_anomaly_notification_icon(location_name)¶
  • This keyword will return total notification rows displaying and row details matching the location name after clicking anomaly Notification icon
  • Flow : Click Anomaly Notification Icon –> Check Notification entries list
  • Keyword Usage
  • ${ROW_INFO}  ${ROW_COUNT} = Get Anomaly Details For Location In Anomaly Notification Icon  ${LOCATION_NAME}
Parameters:location_name – Location name to verify in anomaly Notification Entries
Returns:if notification entries found returns Total rows and location name matched row information in dictionary format else -1
get_ap_details_from_dfs_recurrence_widget_location(location_name)¶
  • Gets all device details from DFS Recurrence Widget Location Details
  • Flow : Copilot page –> DFS Recurrence widget
  • param: location - location name
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get AP Details from DFS Recurrence Widget Location
Returns:returns devices list with the information in format : [[‘Device_669966055461379’, ‘High’, ‘Last Detected: Sep 15 2021’, False], [‘Device_669966055461377’, ‘High’, ‘Last Detected: Sep 14 2021’, False]
Returns:-1 in case of error
get_copilot_account_summary()¶
  • Returns CoPilot Account Summary as a dictionary
  • Flow : Copilot page –> Account Summary
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get CoPilot Account Summary
Returns:Returns CoPilot Account Summary as a dictionary, -1 in case of any errors
get_copilot_licenses()¶

  • Flow : Copilot page –> Get CoPilot Licenses
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get CoPilot Licenses
Returns:Returns Get CoPilot Licenses as a dictionary, -1 in case of any errors

  • Returns Get Devices By OS as a dictionary
  • Flow : Copilot page –> Get Devices By OS
  • Keyword Usage

Returns:Returns Get Devices By OS as a dictionary, -1 in case of any errors

  • Returns Get Devices By Type as a dictionary
  • Flow : Copilot page –> Get Devices By Type
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get Devices By Type
Returns:Returns Get Devices By Type as a dictionary, -1 in case of any errors
get_dfs_recurrence_muted_button_status()¶
  • Get DFS Recurrence Muted Button Status
  • Flow : Copilot page –> DFS Recurrence widget
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get DFS Recurrence Muted Button Status
Returns:returns either HIDE MUTED or SHOW MUTED
get_dfs_recurrence_widget_location_details(location_name=False)¶
  • Get DFS Recurrence Widget Location Details
  • Flow : Copilot page –> DFS Recurrence widget
  • param: location -
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get DFS Recurrence Widget Location Details
Returns:returns location details as an array matching the location name passed as an argument: [1, ‘5544Location’, ‘Medium’, False, False, ‘2’, ‘Last Detected: Sep 15 2021’]
Returns:returns all locations details as an array of arrays like: [[1, ‘5544Location’, ‘Medium’, False, False, ‘2’, ‘Last Detected: Sep 15 2021’], [2, ‘6699Location’, ‘High’, False, False, ‘3’, ‘Last Detected: Sep 15 2021’]]
Returns:returns -1 if error
get_dfs_recurrence_widget_summary()¶
  • Gets DFS Recurrence widget summary in copilot
  • Flow : Copilot page –> DFS Recurrence widget
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get DFS Recurrence Widget Summary
Returns:returns Buildings and APs count if success else returns -1 or -2

  • Flow : Copilot page –> ExtremeCloud IQ Applications
  • Keyword Usage

Returns:Returns ExtremeCloud IQ Applications Summary as a dictionary, -1 in case of any errors
get_links_present_in_wifi_capacity_additional_resources()¶
  • This keyword will get the both video and documentation url Links From WiFi Capacity Additional Resources Page
  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget–> Video Icon —> Additional Resources
  • Keyword Usage
  • ${DOCS_URL_LIST}    ${VIDEO_URL_LIST} =     Get Links Present In WiFi Capacity Additional Resources
Returns:${DOCS_URL_LIST} Documentation URL Links available in WiFi Capacity Additional Resources Page in a list
Returns:${VIDEO_URL_LIST} Video URL Links available in WiFi Capacity Additional Resources Page in a list

get_total_assurance_scan_count()¶
  • Gets total scan count in Assurance scan widget
  • Flow : Copilot page –>Assurance Scan widget
  • Keyword Usage
  • Get Total Assurance Scan Count
  • This keyword developed on q3r1 - g7r1 environment.
Returns:returns 1 if success else returns -1
get_total_numbers_of_anomalies_detected()¶
  • This Keyword will Get Total Number of Anomalies Notification Detected.
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Get Total Numbers Of Anomalies Detected

:return:Total anomalies count if notification found else -1

hide_muted_anomaly_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶
  • This keyword hides the muted anomalies
  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget
  • Keyword Usage
  • Hide Muted Anomaly In WiFi Capacity Widget         ${LOCATION_NAME}
Parameters:location_name – Location name to verify in WiFi capacity widget
Returns:returns 1 if success else returns -1
hide_muted_dfs_recurrence_anomalies()¶
  • Changes the DFS Recurrence Anomalies MUTED Button status to “HIDE MUTED”
  • Flow : Copilot page –> DFS Recurrence widget
  • Keyword Usage
  • Hide Muted DFS Recurrence Anomalies
Returns:returns 1 if successfully pressed HIDE MUTED button else -1
mute_anomaly_for_location_in_dfs_recurrence_widget(location_name)¶
  • This Keyword will mute an anomaly at building level in DFS Recurrence widget
  • Flow: CoPilot–> DFS Recurrence —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click More options and mute Button
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Mute Anomaly For location In DFS Recurrence Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}
Parameters:location_name – Location name to Mute anomaly in DFS Recurrence Widget
Returns:1 if able to click anomaly Mute button for the Location Name or already clicked else -1
mute_anomaly_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name)¶
  • This Keyword will mute an anomaly at building level in wifi capacity widget
  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click More options and mute Button
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Mute Anomaly For location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}
Parameters:location_name – Location name to Mute anomaly in wifi capacity widget
Returns:1 if able to click anomaly Mute button for the Location Name or already clicked else -1
navigate_to_copilot_through_view_all_anomaly()¶
  • This Keyword navigates to Copilot Anomaly Notification Icon
  • Clicks on view all button and validates whether we are in Copilot page or not
  • Flow: Login–> Click on View ALl of copilot Anomaly —> Copilot page
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Navigate To Copilot Through View All Anomaly
Returns:1 if Navigation Successful else -1
pin_anomaly_for_location_in_dfs_recurrence_widget(location_name)¶
  • This Keyword will pin an anomaly at building level in DFS Recurrence widget
  • Flow: CoPilot–> DFS RECURRENCE —> Get Location Name in Rows and Click Pin Button
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Pin Anomaly For location In DFS Recurrence Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}
Parameters:location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in DFS Recurrence widget
Returns:1 if able to click anomaly Pin button for the Location Name or already clicked else -1

pin_individual_ap_for_location_in_dfs_recurrence_widget(location_name, ap_name)¶
  • This Keyword will pin an AP at building level in DFS Recurrence Widget
  • Flow: CoPilot–> DFS Recurrence Widget —> click Location Name in Rows –> Click AP row pin Button
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Pin Individual AP For Location In DFS Recurrence Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}  ${AP_NAME}
Parameters:
  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in DFS Recurrence Widget
  • ap_name – AP name to enable pin in DFS Recurrence Widget of particular location
Returns:

1 if able to click pin button for the AP in Location or already pinned else -1
pin_individual_ap_for_location_in_wifi_capacity_widget(location_name, ap_name)¶
  • This Keyword will pin an AP at building level in wifi capacity widget
  • Flow: CoPilot–> Wi-Fi CAPACITY —> click Location Name in Rows –> Click AP row pin Button
  • Keyword Usage:
  • Pin Individual AP For Location In WiFi Capacity Widget   ${LOCATION_NAME}  ${AP_NAME}
Parameters:
  • location_name – Location name to enable anomaly Pin in wifi capacity widget
  • ap_name – AP name to enable pin in wifi capacity widget of particular location
Returns:

1 if able to click pin button for the AP in Location or already pinned else -1

sort_anomalies_in_wifi_capacity_widget(parameter='Location')¶
  • This keyword sorts anomalies based on input parameter and provides details of anomalies
  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget
  • Keyword Usage
  • Sort Anomalies In WiFi Capacity Widget             ${PARAMETER}
Parameters:parameter – parameter(location/severity/most recent) to sort WiFi capacity widget
Returns:returns 1 if success else returns -1 or -2

unpin_individual_ap_for_location_in_dfs_recurrence_widget(location_name, ap_name)¶

  • Flow: CoPilot–> DFS Recurrence Widget —> click Location Name in Rows –> Click AP row Unpin Button

  • ap_name – AP name to enable Unpin in DFS Recurrence Widget of particular location
Returns:

1 if able to click Unpin button for the AP in Location or already unpinned else -1

validate_loading_additional_resources_documentation_links_in_wifi_capacity()¶
  • This keyword will validate loading documentation links from wifi capacity additional resources Page
  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget–> Video Icon —> Additional Resources
  • Keyword Usage
  • Validate Loading Additional Resources Documentation Links In WiFi Capacity
Returns:1 if All the Additional resources Documentation links loaded Successfully else -1
validate_loading_additional_resources_video_links_in_wifi_capacity()¶

  • Flow : Copilot page –>WiFi capacity widget–> Video Icon —> Additional Resources
  • Keyword Usage
  • Validate Loading Additional Resources Video Links In WiFi Capacity
Returns:1 if All the Additional resources Video links loaded Successfully else -1
verify_copilot_license_widget_manage_link()¶
  • Verifies whether clicking on Manage link taking us to license page in Global Settings
  • Flow : Copilot page –> Get CoPilot Licenses
  • Keyword Usage
  • Verify Copilot License Widget Manage Link
Returns:Returns 1 if navigation successfully verified, -1 in case of any errors
